name: Shanghai Nightlife Tour
description:
Experience this alluring city with a local aficionado of Shanghai nightlife. The small group to a selection of local favorites—from fashionable bars to swanky hotel haunts featuring views and cocktails you wont believe.
Your 5-hour nightlife tour in this incredible metropolis introduces you to the old and the new in glamorous Shanghai. Traipse through Tianzifang, a former factory area now flanked by chic private design studios, art galleries and boutiques.
